basics.name: Brandon Wong
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am an upcoming graduate in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I aspire to be a successful software engineer.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Enhanced the MNU (Multi-node unit/computer) tactical flight software test system to test more effectively the tactical flight software.
highlights: Discovered bug in the source code revealed by turning on the speed optimization flag setting.
Implemented NFS (network file sharing) which enabled standard I/O for MNU system.
Implemented new application load mechanism by utilizing the NFS server as a local file system.
Spearheaded the migration of version control system from Git to GitHub Enterprise.

work.summary: Worked on imaging servers and configured offices phones from a highly secured bank data center.

volunteer.organization: IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers)
volunteer.summary: Chair/President for the IEEE Student Branch Associate Board
Teach algorithms to CS/CE students to prepare them for technical interviews

volunteer.organization: University of Hawaii at Manoa: College of Engineering
highlights: EE 361L: Digital Systems and Computer Design

volunteer.organization: University of Hawaii at Manoa: College of Mathematics
